attributes.action: STOP THE `YELLOW LINE` PARKING FOR 15 MINS AS WHO WILL `POLICE` IT NOBODY
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned DO NOT want as suggested people being allowed to park on `YELLOW LINES` for 15 Min`s for the following reasons, the HIGHWAY CODE would have to be re-worded on this, who will `POLICE` the time `NOBODY` as the police have better things to do, issues are caused each day by drivers doing this now, this causes more issues than good and has not been thought through on ALL the implications it will cause, I agree though with the £130 parking fine.

Trust common sense will prevail.
